ROW.NAME: 季度行业增值税分析表

ROW.DATDSC: select nvl(name,'其他') 行业, max(case when substr(yymm,-2)>=1 and substr(yymm,-2)<=3 then taxmny else 0 end) "第一季度", max(case when substr(yymm,-2)>=4 and substr(yymm,-2)<=6 then taxmny else 0 end) "第二季度", max(case when substr(yymm,-2)>=7 and substr(yymm,-2)<=9 then taxmny else 0 end) "第三季度", max(case when substr(yymm,-2)>=10 and substr(yymm,-2)<=12 then taxmny else 0 end) "第四季度" from ( select a.yymm,b.typclsid,c.name,sum(taxmny)/[%UNIT] taxmny,sum(sdtaxmny)/[%UNIT] sdtax from tax_taxdata a,v_tax_company b,tax_compclass c where substr(a.yymm,0,4)=decode('[%YYYY]','',to_char(sysdate,'yyyy'),'[%YYYY]') and nvl(b.stat,' ') <> '注销' and a.id=b.id and b.typclsid=c.id(+) [%HYCLS] group by a.yymm,b.typclsid,c.name ) group by nvl(name,'其他')
